item.title: Happy Thanksgiving
item.description: For those of us in the United States, we celebrate Thanksgiving today. Although it means different things for different people, I consider it to be a good day to remember those who have helped us and count the blessings that we all take for granted. Without a doubt, I’m most thankful for my family. They’re my support base and I couldn’t get through my days without them. I wish I could thank my coworkers, mentors, and close friends individually, but this blog post would get rather lengthy.
